forms.page_text:
Booklet No: 31066
4.  Discount:
If the remaining total amount is paid within 60 days from the date of digital 
signing of the online allotment letter, a 5% discount will be applicable on 75% 
of the amount (excluding the freehold amount). The applicant should not 
deduct this discount on their own while depositing the remaining amount. 
The discounted amount will be adjusted under other payable heads at the 
time of the final calculation.
5. In case of the applicant's death:
If the allottee or applicant passes away, the registered amount or the allotted 
plot will be transferred to their legal heir upon the submission of the required 
documents.
(Symbolic)
6

Booklet No: 31066
I. Photograph of the applicant(s)
II. Aadhaar card
III. PAN card
IV. Scanned signature
V. Reservation category certificate
VI. A copy of the affidavit as per the format given in the registration booklet.
(Symbolic)
